helps.host: %s <mapname> [mode] - [sky]Starts the server with a specific map
helps.hostx: %s <map id> [mode] - [sky]Starts the server with a specific map
helps.port: %s [port] - [sky]Sets or displays the port for hosting the server
helps.name: %s [name...] - [sky]Change the displayed server name
helps.unban: %s <ip/ID> - [sky]Completely unban a player by IP or ID
helps.save: %s <slot> - [sky]Save current game state to a slot
helps.info: %s <IP/UUID/name...> - [sky]Find player info(s). Can optionally check for all names or IPs a player has had
helps.mode: %s [mode] [sky]view or fixed mode set by the current server, fixed mode set when executing host or hostx commands are not allowed to specify mode, Modes: pvp, attack, sandbox, survival, none
helps.vote: %s <cmd> - [sky]Votetick(60 second), vote by sending 1 or 0 (Yes:1, No:0)
helps.mapManage: %s - [sky]Map manage will start(600 second limit),Maps can be uploaded and deleted.

info.server_restart: The server needs to be restarted. Please wait 10 seconds to log in!
info.votetick_in_progress: Votetick is in progress, please wait!
info.votetick_begin_info: Votetick(%s) started (60 second), vote by sending 1 or 0 (Yes:1, No:0)
info.mode_show: Server mode is [%s],If mode is not set, you can specify a mode when executing host or hostx commands
info.cmd_mapManage_start: Map manage has started(600 seconds limit),Maps can now be uploaded and deleted.
info.cmd_mapManage_end: Map manage has ended,maps can no longer be uploaded and deleted.

error.cmd_load_slot_invalid: [red]Load slot doesn't exist, please check input:%s
error.cmd_is_exceuting: [red]Command %s is executing, please wait for execution to complete!
error.cmd_host_fix_mode: [red]Server is locked to the mode[%s]. If you want to play in other modes, please contact Super Administrator.
